profile.name: Daniel Balcarek
profile.shortBio: Specializing in modern web applications built with .NET and Angular.
profile.longBio: I am a Senior Software Engineer with a strong focus on building modern web applications using .NET and Angular. My work centers on solution architecture, design patterns, and SOLID principles, enabling the delivery of systems that are scalable, maintainable, and resilient. I bring hands-on experience across both backend development with C# and .NET and frontend development with TypeScript and Angular, supporting end-to-end ownership of solutions.
profile.philosophy: As a software craftsman, I actively follow new trends and industry best practices while carefully evaluating their real-world value. I place strong emphasis on clean code, clear architecture, and thoughtful design decisions. Code quality, automated testing, and optimal test coverage are central to my work, as they ensure long-term reliability, maintainability, and confidence when evolving systems over time.

projects.title: Transactional Business System
projects.description: A banking application for processing dividend payments.
projects.problemStatement: Legacy systems were unable to handle the required transaction scale. A modern and reliable solution was needed.
projects.solution: A monolithic architecture built with .NET 10 and deployed on Kubernetes.

projects.title: High-Performance Microservice
projects.description: A microservice designed to process a high volume of requests efficiently.
projects.problemStatement: The system required efficient handling of high request throughput.
projects.solution: Implemented as part of a larger microservices ecosystem with microfrontends.

projects.title: Energy Business Platform
projects.description: A platform for managing clients in the energy sector.
projects.problemStatement: An outdated platform was limiting further business growth.
projects.solution: A complete rewrite using modern technologies and architectural principles.

projects.title: GPS Navigation System
projects.description: A navigation system designed for autonomous vehicles.
projects.problemStatement: The need for reliable navigation in controlled and specific environments.
projects.solution: A client-server application with a WPF frontend and WCF-based services.

projects.title: Authentication Example – AuthApi
projects.description: A full-stack example application demonstrating authentication and authorization.
projects.problemStatement: The need for a clear and practical example showcasing authentication techniques.
projects.solution: A full-stack solution with an Angular frontend and a .NET Minimal API backend implementing JWT and Basic authentication.

projects.title: Vertical Slice Architecture – WeatherApi
projects.description: A REST API for managing weather data built with Minimal API and Vertical Slice Architecture.
projects.problemStatement: The need for a practical example demonstrating Vertical Slice Architecture and design patterns.
projects.solution: A REST API built with .NET Minimal API, showcasing CQRS, repository patterns, and vertical slices.

projects.title: Clean Architecture – FileApi
projects.description: A full-stack example application for file upload and download using Minimal API.
projects.problemStatement: The need for a reference project demonstrating Clean Architecture principles.
projects.solution: A REST API built with .NET Minimal API following Clean Architecture, with a focus on file handling.

projects.title: angular-notifier
projects.description: A well-designed, fully animated, highly customizable notification library for Angular applications.
projects.problemStatement: The need for an easy-to-use and flexible notification solution.
projects.solution: A lightweight and customizable notification library for Angular.

projects.title: angular-mydatepicker
projects.description: A lightweight and customizable Angular date picker and date-range picker with minimal dependencies.
projects.problemStatement: The need for a flexible and easy-to-use date picker solution.
projects.solution: A highly configurable Angular date picker and date-range picker with no external dependencies.
